message.content:
cs.NI, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.SE, cs.AR 

The paper discusses the combination of cloud computing and networking, specifically the use of NetInf as a networking paradigm to support cloud computing. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). The paper also discusses the management of cloud computing infrastructures, which falls under the sub-category cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). Additionally, the paper mentions the complexity of storage and network transport systems, which could fall under cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) or cs.SE (Software Engineering). Finally, the paper proposes a specific name resolution and routing mechanism, which could fall under cs.AR (Hardware Architecture).
